nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping

Class RandomAccessGroups

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping.GroupsAbstract
      • nl.inl.blacklab.search.grouping.RandomAccessGroups
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Group>, Groups
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ResultsGrouper

    public abstract class RandomAccessGroups
extends GroupsAbstract
    Groups results on the basis of a list of criteria. Unlike its base class, this class also allows random access to the groups, and each group provides random access to the hits. Note that this means that all hits found must be retrieved, which may be unfeasible for large results sets.

    • Field Summary
